name: Summer Castle
description:
A small scoring mobile game that will  make you use use all the capabilities of your phone, gyroscop and microphone.

Prevent your sand castle of being flooded, while repelling the crab invasion.

Unlock 9 different skins that come with their unique theme.

A game made by Nicolas Pélicant, Mathilde Singler, Nathan Bataille, William Désert and Lucas Parsy, for Global game jam 2017.
